instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2936 no green light.
threads.message:
Hi, there is a mbp with no green light but, if i connect a charged battery this have a regular functionality. 
No visible water damage.. nothing.



Here my measures:


PPBUS_G3H : 12.25v
PPVIN_SW_T29BST  :  0v
PPBUS_S5_HS_COMPUTING_ISNS : 12.24v
PPBUS_S5_HS_OTHER_ISNS : 12.24v
PPDCIN_G3H : 16.40v

PP3V42_G3H : @ Pin 12 of U7000 3.48v 

PPVRTC_G3H : 3.48v


PP5V_S5 : 0v
PP5V_SUS : 0v
PP5V_S3 : 0v
PP5V_S0 : 0.02v

PP3V3_S5 : 0v
PP3V3_SUS : 0v 
PP3V3_S4 : 0v
PP3V3_S3 : 0v
PP3V3_S0 : 0v


SYS_ONEWIRE Measures:


U6900: 
Pin 5: 0.78v
Pin 1: 0v
Pin 4: 0v


U6901
Pin 1: 0.62v
Pin 5: 3.48v
Pin 4: 0v


U7000
Pin 12: 3.48v
Pin 14: 0.62v 
Pin 4: 3.48v
Pin 2: 16.40v
Pin 3: 4v

Trying to solve the green light, change the U7000 a couple of times… without a good result.

threads.title: 820-2936 no green light.
threads.message: No S5 rails, no green light, no SMC_BC_ACOK.... Maybe SMC?

threads.title: 820-2936 no green light.
threads.message: PPBUS is 12.25... SMCs not coming on. What is SMC RESET_L measuring?

threads.title: 820-2936 no green light.
threads.message:
[QUOTE="TCRScircuit, post: 22101"]PPBUS is 12.25... SMCs not coming on. What is SMC RESET_L measuring?

[/QUOTE]

SMS_RESET_L have 3.45v

threads.title: 820-2936 no green light.
threads.message:
[QUOTE="aprendiz, post: 22122"]Dead SMC.......[/QUOTE]

Are you sure? omg! HAHA, how do you know?

threads.title: 820-2936 no green light.
threads.message: Reflow SMC first, if that does not help replace it from identical donor board.
